title: Magic Nights
description: The alternate cover edition for this book can be found here.After surviving the trials of the Magic Games, mercenary mage Sera Dering is back home in San Francisco. She wants nothing more than to relax and finally have a long-overdue date with dragon shifter Kai.Unfortunately, the universe has other plans.When a young boy is kidnapped by vampires, Seraâ€™s friend Naomi enlists her help to save him. And sometime between fighting monsters, thwarting pirates, and convincing a grumpy ghost to help them, Sera is determined to finish her date.Magic Nights is the third book in the Dragon Born Serafina urban fantasy series.This Extended Editionnovel is over 2.5x longer than the original.For more Dragon Born fantasy, check out the adventures of Sera's sister Alex in the Dragon Born Alexandria series! The Dragon Born Alexandria and Dragon Born Serafina sister series can be read together or independently.
author: Ella Summers
